info.description: "The latest open-source implementation of XSLT 2.0 and XPath 2.0, and XQuery 1.0. This provides the "basic" conformance level of these languages: in effect, this provides all the features of the languages except schema-aware processing. This version reflects the syntax of the final XSLT 2.0, XQuery 1.0, and XPath 2.0 Recommendations of 23 January 2007"
